title: Settings - Google - Services and Preferences won't open. Internal search crashes, gmail crashes etc.
content:
About an hour ago, my phone randomly started eating itself. It started while using the default search bar to do research on golf shoes.

Now gmail will launch but crashes at any attemot to open an e-mail.

Using the search bar will crash tge keyboard on the second keystroke. 

I am not able to even launch the Google: Services and Preferences section in the Settings menu.

I have run Avast malware and cc cleaner with zero issues.

I have deleted cash and storage for Google app.
And this solves the search bar keystroke crash I
Issue for about 60 seconds.

Thoughts?
